title: Best of The Herd: 07/25/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/25/2018
description:
Colin explains why Todd Gurley got paid and Le'Veon Bell still hasn't. He goes through his "Herd Firearchy", his top ten teams in the NFL most likely to become a dumpster fire this season. Plus, Actor and Comedian David Spade comes in-studio to talk about his time on SNL and how he is going to make LeBron his friend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
